title: Steam on Chrome OS: Here’s what games and Chromebooks are supported
content:
Google and Valve have finally launched the fruits of their partnership to bring Steam to Chrome OS; here’s which Chromebooks are ready for playing games and which titles are supported.

more…

The post Steam on Chrome OS: Here’s what games and Chromebooks are supported appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Here’s which Chromebooks are ready for playing games through Steam today and which titles are officially supported.
